titleStmt.title: Hell in an uproar occasioned by a scuffle that happened between the lawyers and the physicians, for superiority. A satyr.
titleStmt.author: Burridge, Richard, b. 1670.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for S. Cook, and are to be sold by most booksellers in London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Satire on a scuffle between lawyers and physicians for superiority.
Reproduction of original in the William Andrews Clark Memorial Library.
